headline: Philip Morris stock gets a bump from smoke-free Zyn
summary: Philip Morris (PM) shares continue to trade near record highs. The stock has gotten a big boost thanks to its product Zyn, a smoke-free nicotine pouch. Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Brooke DiPalma takes a closer look at the stock in the video above. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend here.

headline: US Zyn boom pushed Philip Morris stock to a record. Wall Street still sees 'impressive growth' ahead.
summary: Smokeless nicotine products are benefiting from both longtime cigarette companies and the convenience chains that sell them.

headline: Buy 4 Low-Beta Stocks VTSI, FNV, ESLT & PM Amid Geopolitical Chaos
summary: Amid geopolitical shocks and market uncertainty, low-beta picks like VTSI, FNV, ESLT and PM offer a steadier path forward.

headline: Philip Morris International Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend of $1.35 Per Share
summary: STAMFORD, CT -The Board of Directors of Philip Morris International Inc. today declared a regular quarterly dividend of $1.35 per common share, payable on July 15, 2025, to shareholders of record as...
